title: North Korea’s New Superpower: AI
description: Mysten Labs’ chief cryptographer warns that artificial intelligence, not quantum computing, poses the real near-term threat to blockchain security.
content:
There's a change coming to crypto crime, and North Korea's state-backed hackers are in the vanguard.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Meta and Reliance Join Forces in AI Venture
